Name: Identifier
Description: The list item identifier. Must follow policy defined in configured numbering policy if app.conf setting require_valid_id_number_for_ca_list_items is set. Must be unique if  app.conf setting allow_duplicate_id_number_for_ca_list_items is not set.

Name: Type
Description: A value friom the list_item_types list indicating the type of the record. Stored as an internally generated numeric item_id. When setting this value in a data import or via an API call the item identifier may be used.

Name: Parent
Description: Reference to parent record. Will be null if no parent is defined. When setting this value in a data import or via an API call the  identifier of the parent place may be used.

Name: List
Description: A reference to the list record (ca_lists) of which the list item is a part. Note that a list item is always part of a list. It cannot exist outside of a list. The raw database value contained list_id is an internally generated numeric list_id. However, when setting this intrinsic via an import mapping or API call you may also use the list's code.

Name: Value
Description: Value represented by list item. This is distinct from the identifier and used to convey a text or numeric quantity when required.

Name: Access
Description: Determines visibility of record in public-facing applications such as Pawtucket. Values are defined in the access_statuses list. Typically the list includes values for "public" and "private" visibility. For historical reasons the value stored in the intrinsic is the list item's `value` field, not its identifer or label. By convention "0" is interpreted as private and "1" as public access, although this can be modified or expanded in app.conf if required.

Name: Status
Description: Records the general cataloguing workflow status of the record. Values are defined in the workflow_statuses list. For historical reasons the value stored in the intrinsic is the list item's `value` field, not its identifer or label. Unlike access values, statuses have no functional impact on a record. They are merely informations and intended to provide a simple, straightforward way to track the cataloguing process.

Name: Icon
Description: Icon image to display for listitem.

Name: Color
Description: Highlight color for list item in hex format.

Name: Is enabled?
Description: Flag indicating whether list item is available for use (value set to 1) or not available (value is 0).

Name: Is default?
Description: Flag indicating whether list item is the default selection for its list (value set to 1) or not  (value is 0).

Name: Rank
Description: The sort order position of the list item. Must be a whole number; lower numbers indicate higher ranking in sort.
